title: EscapeQuest.Start
body:
Hello there
<<set $escape_active to 1>>
<<setPlayerStartEscapeFlag CampAreaSecretEscape>>
I told your friend here not to get spotted
Whatever
This is The Secret escape quest
I'm going to write some dialog later explaining this
but the thing is that you need to bring one or two more of your compatriots
Then we can start tunneling out of here
tunneling is going to drain their life force
so, choose wiesly
we need two npcs to tunnel for 10 days each before we can escape
then that's it, we're out of here
